brainly_data.question: During the Cenozoic Era the global climate has turned colder, with the ice caps returning to North America, Eurasia, and Antarctica. All continents extensively developed rocks, particularly on lowland plains such as the Gulf and Atlantic coastal plains of North America. This time in Earth's history marks the disappearance of the dinosaurs. What is true about life on Earth at this time?
brainly_data.subject: Sat

all_answers.question: During the Cenozoic Era the global climate has turned colder, with the ice caps returning to North America, Eurasia, and Antarctica. All continents extensively developed rocks, particularly on lowland plains such as the Gulf and Atlantic coastal plains of North America. This time in Earth's history marks the disappearance of the dinosaurs. What is true about life on Earth at this time?
all_answers.subject: Sat
all_answers.text:
Earth is made of tons of different types of rock.
But it was created by millions and billions of years ago by God.

all_answers.question: During the Cenozoic Era the global climate has turned colder, with the ice caps returning to North America, Eurasia, and Antarctica. All continents extensively developed rocks, particularly on lowland plains such as the Gulf and Atlantic coastal plains of North America. This time in Earth's history marks the disappearance of the dinosaurs. What is true about life on Earth at this time?
all_answers.subject: Sat
all_answers.text: The passage mentions dinosaurs only once, in the last sentence, where it states that they disappeared during the time. So, what's true about life during that time is that dinosaurs died out. The rest is geology and doesn't count as "life"
